attributes.Name: The Point
attributes.eventDescription: Fun and Giggles for mum and the little one(s)! Enjoy a magical Louby Lou session with drinks available at the bar! Get ready for the laugh of your life!

attributes.Name: Culcheth Club
attributes.eventDescription: How about some fun family evening entertainment? Let's get this place brimming with energy! Expect some bingo, singing, dancing, prizes and a little dash of the unexpected! Under 1's come free! There's no such thing as being too old for a louby lou show, from 0-100, giggles are guaranteed!
